definition: fire/urgent/ammunition/fiery or flaming/internal heat (Chinese medicine)/hot (popular)/classifier for military units (old)/Kangxi radical 86
mountain/hill/anything that resembles a mountain/CL:座[zuo4]/bundled straw in which silkworms spin cocoons/gable

sentences.english: Mount Unzen is one of more than a thousand active volcanoes that circle the Pacific Ocean.
sentences.chinese: 雲仙嶽是千餘座活火山這個圈子太平洋之一。

sentences.english: And deepo caves in all parts of the world.
sentences.chinese: 來研究世界各地的活火山和深洞。

sentences.english: The vast majority of the world's most active volcanoes are within a few tens of kilometres of the coast (see map).
sentences.chinese: 世界上絕大多數活火山都在海岸線幾十公里範圍之內。

sentences.english: Drove through Braulio Carrillo Park, the smoke (red arrow) came from this active volcano which I didn't catch the name.
sentences.chinese: 紅箭咀指著的煙霧是由這個不知名的活火山噴出的。

sentences.english: Green sand beach lies on the slopes of the world's largest active volcano mauna loa.
sentences.chinese: 綠沙海灘就位於全球最大的活火山冒納羅亞的斜坡上。

sentences.english: Green sand beach lies on the slopes of the world's largest active volcano maun a loa.
sentences.chinese: 綠沙海灘就位於全球最大的活火山冒納羅亞的斜坡上。

sentences.english: The main island is an active volcano.
sentences.chinese: 羣島的主島是一座活火山。

sentences.english: Grimsvotn is Iceland's most frequently active volcano.
sentences.chinese: 格里姆火山是冰島活動最頻繁的活火山。

sentences.english: He has been able to tell us more about active volcanoes than ancdfds. com man alive.
sentences.chinese: 他能比任何人都要多地告訴活火山的情況。

sentences.english: The caldera is considered an active volcano.
sentences.chinese: 該破火山口被認爲是活火山。

sentences.english: The unusual surface of Io is kept very young by its system of active volcanoes.
sentences.chinese: 木衛一的表面能常保年輕，是因爲它有許多活火山。

sentences.english: The eruption of an active volcano is a terrible phenomenon.
sentences.chinese: 活火山爆發是一種可怕的自然現象。

sentences.english: Has spent his lifetime studying active volcanoes and deep caves in all parts of the world.
sentences.chinese: 花了畢生的精力來研究世界各地的活火山和深洞。

sentences.english: This is an active volcano which spews out lava every year .
sentences.chinese: 這是個每年噴熔岩的活火山。

sentences.english: Did you know that there are still active volcanoes ?
sentences.chinese: 你知道嗎現在還有活火山的存在？

sentences.english: Etna volcano 3329 meters above sea level, is the highest active volcano in Europe.
sentences.chinese: 埃特納火山海拔3329米，是歐洲最高的活火山。

definition: Mount Aso, active volcano in Kyushu, Japan

definition: Kilauea, Hawaii, the world's most active volcano
